page.title: 05Attitudes and clubs
page.content: Concern at the lack of housing for the increasing number of aged members of the community.Sheltered accommodation deemed a necessity. Community Council concerned with such a project in co_operation with a housing association. A good community spirit exists in the village of Bedlinog itself.Most people are very friendly and neighbourliness is a very important word in our present day community. We have two social clubs,a Royal British Legion Club and a Rugby Club; where various people go for soial evenings.We also have a Cricket Club, Angling Club,Allotment and Garden Club,Ladies and Mens Bowls Clubs and a Senior Citizens Day Centre.
